org.gradle.plugins.ide.idea

Class GenerateIdeaWorkspace

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradle.api.internal.AbstractTask
      • org.gradle.api.DefaultTask
        • org.gradle.api.internal.ConventionTask
          • org.gradle.plugins.ide.api.GeneratorTask<T>
            • org.gradle.plugins.ide.api.XmlGeneratorTask<Workspace>
              • org.gradle.plugins.ide.idea.GenerateIdeaWorkspace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Task>, org.gradle.api.internal.DynamicObjectAware, org.gradle.api.internal.IConventionAware, org.gradle.api.internal.TaskInternal, ExtensionAware, Task, org.gradle.util.Configurable<Task>

    public class GenerateIdeaWorkspace
extends XmlGeneratorTask<Workspace>
    Generates an IDEA workspace file *only* for root project. There's little you can configure about workspace generation at the moment.
